Welcome_to_Portainer: 欢迎来到Portainer！ 单击下面列表中的任何端点以访问管理功能。
You_do_not_have_access_to_any_environmen: 您无权访问任何环境。 请联系您的管理员。

Talk_to_your_friends: 告诉你的朋友和同事Portainer是多么棒的！

at_least_8_characters_long: 您的新密码长度必须至少为8个字符

URL_or_IP_address_of_a_Docker_host_must_: Docker主机的URL或IP地址。 Docker API必须通过TCP端口公开。 请参阅Docker文档进行配置。

Please_create_the_initial_administrator_: 请创建初始管理员用户。
Connect_Portainer_to_the_Docker_environm: 将Portainer连接到您要管理的Docker环境。

如果需要使用客户端证书进行身份验证，请启用此选项。
You_can_select_which_user_or_team_can_ac: You can select which user or team can access this registry by moving them to the authorized accesses table. Simply click on a user or team entry to move it from one table to the other.

Enable_this_option_if_you_need_to_specif: Enable this option if you need to specify credentials to connect to this registry.
URL_or_IP_address_of_a_Docker_registry: URL or IP address of a Docker registry.
Enable_this_option_if_you_specify_creden: Enable this option if you need to specify credentials to connect to this registry.
The_DockerHub_registry_can_be_used_by_an: The DockerHub registry can be used by any user. You can specify the credentials that will be used to push & pull images here.
Enable_this_option_if_you_need_to_specif: Enable this option if you need to specify credentials to connect to push/pull private images.
Tasks_are_retrieved_across_all_endpoints: Tasks are retrieved across all endpoints via snapshots. Data available in this view might not be up-to-date.
When_using_internal_authentication_Porta: When using internal authentication, Portainer will encrypt user passwords and store credentials locally.
When_using_LDAP_authentication_Portainer: When using LDAP authentication, Portainer will delegate user authentication to a LDAP server and fallback to internal authentication if LDAP authentication fails.
URL_or_IP_address_of_the_LDAP_server: URL or IP address of the LDAP server.
Account_that_will_be_used_to_search_for_: Account that will be used to search for users.
Enable_this_option_if_want_to_use_StartT: Enable this option if want to use StartTLS to secure the connection to the server. Ignored if Use TLS is selected.
Enable this option if you need to specify TLS certificates to connect to the LDAP server.
Skip_the_verification_of_the_server_TLS_: Skip the verification of the server TLS certificate. Not recommended on unsecured networks.
With_automatic_user_provisioning_enabled: With automatic user provisioning enabled, Portainer will create user(s) automatically with standard user role and assign them to team(s) which matches to LDAP group name(s). If disabled, users must be created in Portainer beforehand.
The_distinguished_name_of_the_element_fr: The distinguished name of the element from which the LDAP server will search for users.
LDAP_attribute_which_denotes_the_usernam: LDAP attribute which denotes the username.
LDAP_search_filter_used_to_select_user_e: The LDAP search filter used to select user elements, optional.
The_distinguished_name_of_the_element_fr: The distinguished name of the element from which the LDAP server will search for groups.
LDAP_attribute_which_denotes_the_group_m: LDAP attribute which denotes the group membership.
LDAP_search_filter_select_group_elements: The LDAP search filter used to select group elements, optional.
specify_URL_logo_For_an_optimal_display_: You can specify the URL to your logo here. For an optimal display, logo dimensions should be 155px by 55px.
When_using_external_templates_something_: When using external templates, in-app template management will be disabled.
specify_the_URL_to_your_own_template_def: You can specify the URL to your own template definitions file here.
When_enabled_regular_users_will_not_be_a: When enabled, regular users will not be able to use bind mounts when creating containers.
When_enabled_regular_users_privileged_mo: When enabled, regular users will not be able to use privileged mode when creating containers.
You_can_hide_containers_with_specific_la: You can hide containers with specific labels from Portainer UI. You need to specify the label name and value.
